price: 7. Na yango, moto oyo akoluka kolekisa ndelo wana, bango nde babuki mibeko,
arabic: فَمَنِ ٱبۡتَغَىٰ وَرَآءَ ذَٰلِكَ فَأُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡعَادُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: famani ib'taghā warāa dhālika fa-ulāika humu al-ʿādūna
